resources.string: In accordance with the MHA\'s order no. 40â€“3/2020-DM-I(A) dated 1st May, 2020 on interstate movement for medical reasons, permission is hereby ganted to the following persons of Jyotsnapur, Diyun District Changlang, Arunachal Pradesh.
That they should return to Bordumsa within 24 (twenty four) hours
All Covid-19 related guidelines/SOP and restrictions to be strictly followed i.e, social distancing, mandatory wearing of face mask & gloves, vehicle sanitization etc.
That they will be kept on Facility quarantine centre if Driver and patient come back together.
